meleeRange(Creature) - Method in class game.Monster

This class inherits from Creature.java.

Handels the turn of all monsters.

Handles moveButton.
moveCreature(int, int, ArrayList<Creature>) - Method in class game.Creature
Moves the Creature to a new position.
moveFinished() - Method in class GUI.BattlefieldController
Method that runs when the player performed a move-action
moveTo(Creature, ArrayList<Creature>) - Method in class game.Monster
moves the Monster to a Creature when the Creature is within the movement range of the Monster.Also makes sure Monster does not move on top of another Creature.
moveToward(Creature, ArrayList<Creature>) - Method in class game.Monster
Moves the Monster towards a Creature when the creature is out of range.
MusicPlayer - Class in audio
This class is used to make a playlist of songs that play in the background of the game.
